channel.title: Commands dont work!

item.title: Commands dont work!
item.dc:creator: @Enjoi_Sk8 Enjoi Sk8
item.description:
@Enjoi_Sk8 wrote:

i just added 2 commands to my server that werent there b4 and when i save compile and type them in game they dont work (yes i m player rights 3)

EDIT: im using prima’s summon pkz project czar cleaned source if that helps

here r the codes + 1 code above and 1 below:

[code]if(command.equals(“xteleall”)) {
for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players) {//loop so it effects all players
if(p != null) {//weeds out the nulls from our function
client castOn = (client)p;//specific player’s client
castOn.teleportToX = absX;//replace with your tele X coord
castOn.teleportToY = absY;//replace with your tele Y coord
}
}
}
///////Added Commands///////////
